sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout' import {useFormik} from 'formik' import * as Yup from 'yup' const Login = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: '', password : '' }, validationSchema : Yup.object({ email: Yup.string().email('El email no es válido') .required('El email no puede ir vacio'), password: Yup.string() .required('El password es obligatorio') }) }) return ( <>

Login

 ); } export default Login;
